import{createReducer}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={isAuthenticated:false};export var userReducer=createReducer(initialState,{LoadUserRequest:function LoadUserRequest(state){state.loading=true;// state.loading meaning: if loading is true, then the user is not authenticated
},LoadUserSuccess:function LoadUserSuccess(state,action){state.isAuthenticated=true;state.loading=false;state.user=action.payload;},LoadUserFail:function LoadUserFail(state,action){state.loading=false;state.error=action.payload;state.isAuthenticated=false;},// update user information
updateUserInfoRequest:function updateUserInfoRequest(state){state.loading=true;},updateUserInfoSuccess:function updateUserInfoSuccess(state,action){state.loading=false;state.user=action.payload;},updateUserInfoFailed:function updateUserInfoFailed(state,action){state.loading=false;state.error=action.payload;},// Update User address
updateUserAddressRequest:function updateUserAddressRequest(state){state.addressloading=true;},updateUserAddressSuccess:function updateUserAddressSuccess(state,action){state.addressloading=false;state.successMessage=action.payload.successMessage;state.user=action.payload.user;},updateUserAddressFailed:function updateUserAddressFailed(state,action){state.addressloading=false;state.error=action.payload;},// delete user address
deleteUserAddressRequest:function deleteUserAddressRequest(state){state.addressloading=true;},deleteUserAddressSuccess:function deleteUserAddressSuccess(state,action){state.addressloading=false;state.successMessage=action.payload.successMessage;state.user=action.payload.user;},deleteUserAddressFailed:function deleteUserAddressFailed(state,action){state.addressloading=false;state.error=action.payload;},// get all users --- admin
getAllUsersRequest:function getAllUsersRequest(state){state.usersLoading=true;},getAllUsersSuccess:function getAllUsersSuccess(state,action){state.usersLoading=false;state.users=action.payload;},getAllUsersFailed:function getAllUsersFailed(state,action){state.usersLoading=false;state.error=action.payload;},clearErrors:function clearErrors(state){state.error=null;}});// reducer -> logic (state change)
